title: Dark Alley: Stranger
description: ACE for ASIN: B010IPED18Newly single and self-confident Alice has recently decided that she doesn't need a man to feel complete, if it wasn't for the one activity where a man can come quite handy. On a girl's night out that was bound to be embarrassing and boring, since every girl of her clique is a mommy or about to become one, Alice makes a lot of interesting acquaintances and thanks to one of them she receives a mysterious invite to the "Dark Alley". Too curious to heed her best friend's warnings, Alice heads out to end up having, hot, sizzling sex with a faceless stranger.Episodes:#1 Dark Alley Stranger#2 Dark Alley Club#3 Dark Alley Master
author: D.S. Wrights
